title: Studio for rent in Riga, Alfrēda Kalniņa iela
amenities: Private toilet; Private kitchen; Private bathroom; No Parking; Laminate flooring; Gas heating; Private kitchenware; WiFi
Long description: 1 of 11 bright studios available from September till middle of June! Rent 460 + fixed utilities 100 EUR. Fixed price including all utilities (wifi, heating, water, electricity) 560 EUR. If rented for 6+ months price is only 514 EUR. Freshly renovated studio apartments at Alfrēda Kalniņa 4 (7 min walk from Old Town, 3 min from Stockmann and Origo, 3 min from Vērmanes Park). Facilities include iron, washing machine, fridge, tumble dryer, work desk, large smart TV. 4th floor, no elevator. Each studio for 1 person only. Non-smoking.

title: Bright Studio on Alfrēda Kalniņa Street
Long description: 1 of 11 bright studios available from September till middle of June! Rent 550 + fixed utilities 100 EUR. Fixed price including all utilities (wifi, heating, water, electrocity) 650 Eur. 10% discount ifrented for 6+ months. Rented by owner- no broker commissions. Freshly r enovated studio apartments are located on Alfreda Kalnina 4 (7 minute walk from Old Town, 3 min from Stockman and Origo, 3 min from Vermanes Park). It has all necessary facilities, such as iron, washing machine, fridge, tumble drier, work desk, etc. Large smart TV, work desk as well (not in picture). There will be everything that you may need in the room. Apartment on 4th floor, no elevator. Each studio for 1 person only. It has a balcony but is non-smoking.
